title: Total brand value major sports leagues ( NFL , MLB , NBA & NHL ) 2013
summary: This bar chart has 4 categories for the x axis representing Sports League, and a y axis representing Brand value (in million U.S. dollars).
The highest category is found at National_Football_League where Brand value (in million U.S. dollars) is 9131.8.
The lowest category is found at National_Hockey_League where Brand value (in million U.S. dollars) is 1560.4.
